articles.title: Hubble Celebrates 34th Anniversary With a Spectacular View of the Little Dumbbell Nebula - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Glowing Bipolar Bubble From Dying Star Expands Into Space In celebration of the 34th anniversary of the launch of NASA's legendary Hubble Space Telescope on April 24, 1990, astronomers took a snapshot of the Little Dumbbell Nebula. Also known as Messier 76, M…
articles.content: Astronomers celebrated the 34th anniversary of the Hubble Space Telescope by capturing an image of the Little Dumbbell Nebula, 3400 light-years away. Hubble has conducted 1.6 million observations and… [+8868 chars]

articles.description: Apple has reportedly decided to not equip its upcoming 129-inch iPad Air with mini-LED technology choosing to stick with regular LCD displays to keep the device affordable
